<section class="mb-4" id='button-test'>
	<button type="button" class="btn btn-primary" data-dna="btn">Primary</button>
	<button type="button" class="btn btn-secondary" data-dna="btn">Secondary</button>
	<button type="button" class="btn btn-success" data-dna="btn">Success</button>
	<button type="button" class="btn btn-info" data-dna="btn">Info</button>
	<button type="button" class="btn btn-warning" data-dna="btn">Warning</button>
	<button type="button" class="btn btn-danger" data-dna="btn">Danger</button>
</section>

<section class="mb-4">
	<button type="button" class="btn btn-outline-primary" data-dna="btn">Primary</button>
	<button type="button" class="btn btn-outline-secondary" data-dna="btn">Secondary</button>
	<button type="button" class="btn btn-outline-success" data-dna="btn">Success</button>
	<button type="button" class="btn btn-outline-info" data-dna="btn">Info</button>
	<button type="button" class="btn btn-outline-warning" data-dna="btn">Warning</button>
	<button type="button" class="btn btn-outline-danger" data-dna="btn">Danger</button>
</section>

<section class="mb-4">
	<button type="button" class="btn btn-info btn-sm" data-dna="btn">Small</button>
	<button type="button" class="btn btn-success" data-dna="btn">Regular</button>
	<button type="button" class="btn btn-primary btn-lg" data-dna="btn">Large</button>
	<button type="button" class="btn btn-outline-primary btn-lg" data-dna="btn">Large</button>
	<button type="button" class="btn btn-outline-success" data-dna="btn">Regular</button>
	<button type="button" class="btn btn-outline-info btn-sm" data-dna="btn">Small</button>
</section>

Button States

Active

Dependencies
Files Selectors
src/materials/buttons/00.button.html
.btn
.btn-info
.btn-outline-info
.btn-outline-primary
.btn-outline-secondary
.btn-outline-success
.btn-outline-warning
.btn-primary
.btn-secondary
.btn-success
.btn-warning
 11

Adding the .active class to a button will apply the active state.

<p class="mb-4">Adding the <kbd>.active</kbd> class to a button will apply the active state.</p>

<section class="mb-4">
	<button data-dna="btn-active" type="button" class="active btn btn-primary">Primary</button>
	<button data-dna="btn-active" type="button" class="active btn btn-secondary">Secondary</button>
	<button data-dna="btn-active" type="button" class="active btn btn-success">Success</button>
	<button data-dna="btn-active" type="button" class="active btn btn-info">Info</button>
	<button data-dna="btn-active" type="button" class="active btn btn-warning">Warning</button>
	<button data-dna="btn-active" type="button" class="active btn btn-danger">Danger</button>
</section>

<section>
	<button data-dna="btn-active" type="button" class="active btn btn-outline-primary">Primary</button>
	<button data-dna="btn-active" type="button" class="active btn btn-outline-secondary">Secondary</button>
	<button data-dna="btn-active" type="button" class="active btn btn-outline-success">Success</button>
	<button data-dna="btn-active" type="button" class="active btn btn-outline-info">Info</button>
	<button data-dna="btn-active" type="button" class="active btn btn-outline-warning">Warning</button>
	<button data-dna="btn-active" type="button" class="active btn btn-outline-danger">Danger</button>
</section>

Disabled

Dependencies
Files Selectors
src/materials/buttons/00.button.html
.btn
.btn-info
.btn-primary
.btn-secondary
.btn-success
.btn-warning
 6

Adding the disabled attribute to a button will apply the disabled state.

<p class="mb-4">Adding the <kbd>disabled</kbd> attribute to a button will apply the disabled state.</p>
<section>
	<button data-dna="btn-disabled" type="button" disabled class="btn btn-primary">Primary</button>
	<button data-dna="btn-disabled" type="button" disabled class="btn btn-secondary">Secondary</button>
	<button data-dna="btn-disabled" type="button" disabled class="btn btn-success">Success</button>
	<button data-dna="btn-disabled" type="button" disabled class="btn btn-info">Info</button>
	<button data-dna="btn-disabled" type="button" disabled class="btn btn-warning">Warning</button>
	<button data-dna="btn-disabled" type="button" disabled class="btn btn-danger">Danger</button>
</section>

Toggle

Dependencies
Files Selectors
src/materials/buttons/00.button.html
.btn
.btn-primary
 2

Add data-toggle="button" to toggle a button’s active state. If you’re pre-toggling a button, you must manually add the .active class and aria-pressed="true" to the <button>

<p class="mb-4">Add <kbd>data-toggle="button"</kbd> to toggle a button’s active state. If you’re pre-toggling a button, you must manually add the <kbd>.active</kbd> class and <kbd>aria-pressed="true"</kbd> to the <kbd>&lt;button&gt;</kbd></p>
<section>
	<button data-dna="btn-toggle" type="button" class="btn btn-primary" data-toggle="button" aria-pressed="false" autocomplete="off">
    Single toggle
  </button>
</section>

<section>
	<div data-dna="btn-group" class="btn-group mb-4" role="group" aria-label="...">
		<button type="button" class="btn btn-primary">Left</button>
		<button type="button" class="btn btn-primary">Middle</button>
		<button type="button" class="btn btn-primary">Right</button>
	</div>
</section>

		<button type="button" class="btn btn-outline-primary">Left</button>
		<button type="button" class="btn btn-outline-primary">Middle</button>
		<button type="button" class="btn btn-outline-primary">Right</button>
	</div>
</section>

Checkbox

Dependencies
Files Selectors
src/materials/buttons/00.button.html
.btn
.btn-primary
 2
src/materials/buttons/button-groups/01.horizontal.html
.btn-group
 1 
<div data-dna="btn-group-checkbox" class="btn-group" data-toggle="buttons">
	<label class="btn btn-primary active">
    <input type="checkbox" checked autocomplete="off"> Checkbox 1 (pre-checked)
  </label>
	<label class="btn btn-primary">
    <input type="checkbox" autocomplete="off"> Checkbox 2
  </label>
	<label class="btn btn-primary">
    <input type="checkbox" autocomplete="off"> Checkbox 3
  </label>
</div>

Radio

Dependencies
Files Selectors
src/materials/buttons/00.button.html
.btn
.btn-primary
 2
src/materials/buttons/button-groups/01.horizontal.html
.btn-group
 1 
<div data-dna="btn-group-radio" class="btn-group" data-toggle="buttons">
	<label class="btn btn-primary active">
    <input type="radio" name="options" id="option1" autocomplete="off" checked> Radio 1 (preselected)
  </label>
	<label class="btn btn-primary">
    <input type="radio" name="options" id="option2" autocomplete="off"> Radio 2
  </label>
	<label class="btn btn-primary">
    <input type="radio" name="options" id="option3" autocomplete="off"> Radio 3
  </label>
</div>
